amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for being used to carry out section 287(g) (immigration enforcement program) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for being used to carry out section 287(g) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A059) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 313 (Roll no. 407).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A059) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 313 (Roll no. 407).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Polis.
